meanings.definition: To devote (time, effort, or oneself) to a particular task or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She will dedicate her time to helping others in need.
meanings.sent2: They dedicate their weekends to volunteering at the local shelter.
meanings.sent3: He decided to dedicate his day to learning new skills.
meanings.sent4: The artist dedicated hours to perfecting every detail of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The team dedicated themselves to winning the championship.

meanings.definition: To set aside for a specific purpose or use.
meanings.sent1: Please dedicate a portion of your savings for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: They dedicate a room in their house for guests.
meanings.sent3: She dedicated a special jar for collecting coins.
meanings.sent4: The library dedicated a section for rare books.
meanings.sent5: He dedicated a corner of the garden for growing vegetables.

meanings.definition: To inscribe or address (a work of art, book, etc.) to a person or cause.
meanings.sent1: The author will dedicate her new book to her family.
meanings.sent2: They dedicate the sculpture to the memory of their mentor.
meanings.sent3: He dedicated the painting to his loyal fans.
meanings.sent4: The artist dedicated the mural to the community.
meanings.sent5: She dedicated the poem to her best friend.
